fields.description: AuthenticationType to be used for connection. It is mutually exclusive with connectionString property.
fields.name: AuthenticationType

fields.description: Certificate Common Name when TLS is enabled. It is mutually exclusive with connectionString property. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: CertificateCommonName

fields.description: The connection string. It is mutually exclusive with server, database, authenticationType, userName, packageCollection and certificateCommonName property. Type: string, SecureString or AzureKeyVaultSecretReference.
fields.name: ConnectionString

fields.description: Database name for connection. It is mutually exclusive with connectionString property. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Database

fields.description: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. It is mutually exclusive with connectionString property. Type: string.
fields.name: EncryptedCredential

fields.description: Under where packages are created when querying database. It is mutually exclusive with connectionString property. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: PackageCollection

fields.description: Server name for connection. It is mutually exclusive with connectionString property. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Server

fields.description: Username for authentication. It is mutually exclusive with connectionString property. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Username
